name: Hand Trowel
description: A versatile hand tool for digging small holes, transplanting seedlings, and loosening soil in pots or beds.

careGuide.Usage: Use for spot digging, potting, and transplanting.
careGuide.Maintenance: Rinse off soil and dry after each use; oil metal parts to prevent rust.
careGuide.Storage: Hang or store in a dry place away from moisture.

shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.

name: Pruning Shears
description: Sharp handheld shears for trimming stems, shaping shrubs, and removing dead growth.

careGuide.Usage: Cut at a 45° angle just above a node for clean healing.
careGuide.Maintenance: Wipe blades after use; sharpen and oil joints regularly.
careGuide.Storage: Lock the safety latch and store out of children’s reach.

shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.

name: Watering Can
description: Balanced can with a gentle spout for even watering without disturbing soil.

careGuide.Usage: Water at the soil line to avoid wet leaves and fungal issues.
careGuide.Maintenance: Empty after use and rinse periodically to prevent algae.
careGuide.Storage: Keep in shade or indoors to extend life.

shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.

name: Garden Rake
description: Sturdy rake with long tines for clearing debris, leveling soil, and spreading mulch.

careGuide.Usage: Use light, even strokes to gather leaves and break soil clumps.
careGuide.Maintenance: Brush off dirt; check and tighten handle fittings.
careGuide.Storage: Hang tines-up in a dry shed to avoid bending.

shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.

name: Garden Gloves
description: Durable gloves that protect hands from thorns, dirt, and abrasion while gardening.

careGuide.Usage: Wear for pruning, repotting, and handling rough materials.
careGuide.Maintenance: Hand-wash or machine-wash as directed; air dry fully.
careGuide.Storage: Store dry to prevent mildew and odor.

shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.
